author: Flippin' Bats with Ben Verlander
title: Shohei Ohtani (大谷翔平)'s Scorching Start Propels Dodgers Sweep Over Cubs
text:
Shohei Ohtani (大谷翔平)’s Scorching Start Propels Dodgers Sweep Over Cubs
Ben Verlander recaps the Tokyo Series as the Los Angeles Dodgers sweep the Chicago Cubs in the Tokyo Series. Ben breaks down Shohei Ohtani's hot start, Roki Sasaki's Dodgers debut, the Chicago Cubs slow start and more. CHAPTERS: 00:00 - 00:30 INTRO 00:30 - 03:00 Dodgers/Cubs Game 2 Recap 03:00 - 07:00 Roki Sasaki's Dodgers Debut 07:00 - 12:00 Shohei Ohtani's HOT Start 12:00 - 20:30 Chicago Cubs Slow Start 20:30 - 23:05 OUTRO Use code: VERLANDER to get 15%! https://gokinesiologysleeves.com/discount/verlander #FlippinBats #mlb #japan #tokyo #tokyoseries #shoheiohtani #ohtani #shohei #losangeles #dodgers #losangelesdodgers #baseball SUBSCRIBE to get the latest Flippin’ Bats...
Read more at www.youtube.com
